description: This file implements RESTful API routes for a relational data model related to subjects, modules, lessons, activities, quizzes, and progress tracking. It utilizes FastAPI, SQLAlchemy ORM models, and Pydantic schemas to expose endpoints for CRUD operations and querying nested entities. The code includes utility functions for pagination, entity mapping, and reference validation, and is structured with route handlers for each resource with appropriate HTTP methods and status codes.

methods.name: paginate(query, page: int, page_size: int)
methods.description: Apply pagination to a SQLAlchemy ORM query.

methods.name: Optional[str] like_search(term: Optional[str])
methods.description: Return SQL LIKE pattern for case-insensitive search.

methods.name: SubjectRead to_subject_read(entity: Subject, include_nested: bool = False)
methods.description: Map Subject ORM instance to SubjectRead Pydantic schema.

methods.name: ModuleRead to_module_read(entity: Module, include_nested: bool = False)
methods.description: Map Module ORM instance to ModuleRead schema.

methods.name: ActivityRead to_activity_read(entity: Activity)
methods.description: Map Activity ORM instance to ActivityRead schema.

methods.name: LessonRead to_lesson_read(entity: Lesson, include_nested: bool = False)
methods.description: Map Lesson ORM instance to LessonRead schema.

methods.name: ProgressRead to_progress_read(entity: Progress)
methods.description: Map Progress ORM instance to ProgressRead schema.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_subjects( search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )
methods.description: List subjects with pagination and optional search.

methods.name: SubjectRead create_subject(payload: SubjectCreate)
methods.description: Create a new subject.

methods.name: SubjectRead get_subject( subject_id: int, include_nested: bool = Query(False, description="Include modules tree") )
methods.description: Retrieve a specific subject, including nested modules if requested.

methods.name: SubjectRead update_subject(subject_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Update fields of an existing subject.

methods.name: None delete_subject(subject_id: int)
methods.description: Soft delete a subject.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_modules_for_subject( subject_id: int, search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List modules associated with a specific subject.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_modules( subject_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by subject id"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List modules with optional filtering by subject and search.

methods.name: ModuleRead create_module(payload: ModuleCreate)
methods.description: Create a new module under a specified subject.

methods.name: ModuleRead get_module( module_id: int, include_nested: bool = Query(False, description="Include lessons tree") )
methods.description: Retrieve a module by ID, optionally including nested lessons.

methods.name: ModuleRead update_module(module_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Update fields of an existing module.

methods.name: None delete_module(module_id: int)
methods.description: Soft delete a module.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_lessons_for_module( module_id: int, search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List lessons within a specific module.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_lessons( module_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by module id"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List lessons with optional filtering by module and search.

methods.name: LessonRead create_lesson(payload: LessonCreate)
methods.description: Create a new lesson in a specified module.

methods.name: LessonRead get_lesson( lesson_id: int, include_nested: bool = Query(False, description="Include activities") )
methods.description: Retrieve a lesson by ID, optionally including nested activities.

methods.name: LessonRead update_lesson(lesson_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Update fields of an existing lesson.

methods.name: None delete_lesson(lesson_id: int)
methods.description: Soft delete a lesson.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_activities_for_lesson( lesson_id: int, page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List activities within a specific lesson.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_activities( lesson_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by lesson id"), type: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by type: content|quiz"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List activities with optional filtering by lesson and type.

methods.name: ActivityRead create_activity(payload: ActivityCreate)
methods.description: Create a new activity associated with a lesson.

methods.name: ActivityRead get_activity(activity_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieve an activity by ID.

methods.name: ActivityRead update_activity(activity_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Update fields of an existing activity.

methods.name: None delete_activity(activity_id: int)
methods.description: Soft delete an activity.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_quizzes( lesson_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by lesson id"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List all quiz activities with optional lesson filtering.

methods.name: ActivityRead create_quiz(payload: ActivityCreate)
methods.description: Create a new quiz (type=quiz) activity.

methods.name: ActivityRead get_quiz(quiz_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieve a quiz activity by ID, validating type.

methods.name: ActivityRead update_quiz(quiz_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Update a quiz activity.

methods.name: None delete_quiz(quiz_id: int)
methods.description: Soft delete a quiz activity.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_progress( user_id: str = Query(..., description="User id"), subject_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), module_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), lesson_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), activity_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )
methods.description: List progress entries for a user with filters and pagination.

methods.name: ProgressRead upsert_progress(payload: ProgressUpsertPayload)
methods.description: Create or update a progress record for a user and entity.

methods.name: ProgressRead get_progress(progress_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieve a progress record by ID.

methods.name: None delete_progress(progress_id: int)
methods.description: Soft delete a progress record.

methods.name: Dict[str,Optional[int]] _resolve_progress_targets(payload: ProgressUpsertPayload)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: None _validate_references(session: Session, refs: Dict[str, Optional[int]])
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: get_lesson
ctags.signature: ( lesson_id: int, include_nested: bool = Query(False, description="Include activities") )

ctags.name: get_module
ctags.signature: ( module_id: int, include_nested: bool = Query(False, description="Include lessons tree") )

ctags.name: get_subject
ctags.signature: ( subject_id: int, include_nested: bool = Query(False, description="Include modules tree") )

ctags.signature: ( lesson_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by lesson id"), type: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by type: content|quiz"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_activities_for_lesson
ctags.signature: ( lesson_id: int, page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_lessons
ctags.signature: ( module_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by module id"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_lessons_for_module
ctags.signature: ( module_id: int, search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.signature: ( subject_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by subject id"), search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_modules_for_subject
ctags.signature: ( subject_id: int, search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_progress
ctags.signature: ( user_id: str = Query(..., description="User id"), subject_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), module_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), lesson_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), activity_id: Optional[int] = Query(None), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_quizzes
ctags.signature: ( lesson_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by lesson id"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), )

ctags.name: list_subjects
ctags.signature: ( search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search in slug/title"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )

ctags.name: to_lesson_read
ctags.pattern: /^def to_lesson_read(entity: Lesson, include_nested: bool = False) -> LessonRead:$/

ctags.name: to_module_read
ctags.pattern: /^def to_module_read(entity: Module, include_nested: bool = False) -> ModuleRead:$/

ctags.name: to_subject_read
ctags.pattern: /^def to_subject_read(entity: Subject, include_nested: bool = False) -> SubjectRead:$/

ctags.pattern: /^def update_activity(activity_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any]) -> ActivityRead:$/

ctags.pattern: /^def update_lesson(lesson_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any]) -> LessonRead:$/

ctags.name: update_module
ctags.pattern: /^def update_module(module_id: int, updates: Dict[str, Any]) -> ModuleRead:$/
